Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Taurox
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The Taurox APC is a nimble and versatile asset symbolizing the adaptable might of the Imperium in the harsh 41st millennium. With a sleek and agile design, this armored transport wears resilient plating, showcasing scars of battle and signifying durability and efficiency in the ongoing war.

The Taurox's streamlined and purposeful aesthetic reflects the practical nature demanded by the grim realities of warfare in the Imperium. Tailored for rapid deployment and maneuverability, it symbolizes battlefield agility, enabling swift troop transport and hit-and-run tactics against evolving threats.

Navigating the war-torn landscape, the Taurox stands as a symbol of the Imperium's ability to swiftly adapt, offering a mobile and resilient solution in the relentless struggle of GrimWorld 40,000. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew :</color> Driver x1, Passengers x11
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
